attributes.action: Experienced Construction Workers to not have to pay for NVQs and CSCS cards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Since new regulations were bourght in concerning CSCS cards on construction sites, Experienced worker who have missed the Grandfather rights scheme now have to pay for an NVQ to obtain a CSCS card. 
We want for those with 10 or more years experience in their job to not have to pay for the right to work and the NVQ should be free to all those who can show complete competance in their trade.
